atom.description: User registration form validates that required fields are filled and email format is correct before allowing account creation
observableOutcomes: Submitting with empty required fields shows field-specific error messages
Submitting with malformed email shows email format error
Submitting with all valid fields creates the account and redirects to dashboard
atom.reasoning: Inferred from registration-validation.spec.ts: the test suite checks field-level validation on the registration form. The atom is behavior-focused and testable, though it combines validation and creation into a single atom. The outcomes are specific enough to be falsifiable.
atom.sourceTestName: should validate required fields and email format on registration
